about_the_game:
Into battle! Become a true of Battle Tanks!

Join the elite army of tankers in the dynamic and free battles of our online game. Experience a unique battle in realistic 3D where each tank turns into a powerful weapon while fighting in an epic war.

A variety of techniques 

Download the free online game and discover a world where every fight won't let you get bored. All tanks - from fast light to powerful heavy - are waiting for your order.

Tank battles

Choose your path in this free game: become a tank battle hero. In Battle Tanks, every battle is another step towards glory!

Modernization of equipment

Develop your tank and become invincible. In Battle tanks, your main task is to quickly and skillfully upgrade military equipment

Immerse yourself in history

The battle on legendary tanks is now not only in history, but also on the screens of your devices. In Battle Tanks, everyone can become a legend, everyone can succeed.

Feel the power of naval battles and the power of military vehicles by playing free tanks. Your legendary battles and unforgettable victories are already waiting for you in Battle Tanks Online.

Join us and conquer the world of tanks!

Are you ready for free tank battles? In Battle Tanks you will find a place where everyone can become a hero. Enter battle tanks and prove that you are the best tank driver.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS, Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 630 or similar (2GB VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 630 or similar (2GB VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Battle Tanks: World War II

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™2 Quad Q6600 & AMD Athlon II X4 640 AM3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon RX 460 or Intel HD 630 (2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Are you ready to fight? Download this incredibly addictive tank game right now! Choose a tank and fight with your friends in dynamic real-time battles.Meet the legendary tank shooter Battle Tanks! Show the whole world who's in charge here!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Vietnamese, Danish, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
